bible.derived: Masoretic Text (Biblia Hebraica), Textus Receptus Greek text

translations.name: The Scriptures
translations.description: A popular Messianic Translation by the Institute for Scripture Research, The Scriptures is a relatively new translation published by the Institute for Scripture Research. The order of the books in the Pre-Messianic Scriptures (Old Testament) are in the Hebraic order with Torah (Law) first, then the Nebi'im (Prophets), then the Kethubim (Writings). The names of God and Jesus are in Hebrew letters. The Hebrew names for Biblical personages are privileged. For instance, \\\"Jacob\\\" is \\\"Ya'aqob.\\\"
